reporter_caption.center: DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL v. WILSON, 106 Ohio St.3d 1404 (2005)

opinion.opinion_text:
DISCIPLINARY CASES
IT IS ORDERED by this court, sua sponte, that Harrison Wilson, Attorney Registration No. 0015561, last known business address in Richmond, Virginia, is found in contempt for failure to comply with this court's order of October 25, 2004, to wit: failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before November 24, 2004.
